greeting.myJobDetail: I love making beautiful interfaces and gain experience through all the works I have done as a Web Developer. Since childhood, I have had a passion for computers and always wanted to become a Game Developer. But now I became a Frontend Web Developer. <3

homePage.myPicture: Click the button below to see my projects

d1.description: This is my first project. An E-commerce website to sell candies. This project was built using Html, Css and Javascript with features such as product listing, product details and shopping cart.

d2.description: A movies website I created to practicing coding. Because of copyright issues, I linked it to the youtube trailer. Developed using the ReactJS and styled using Bootstrap..

d3.description: The English learning website has a system of adding experience points and leveling up titles every time a lesson is completed.

d5.description: This is a Japanese website interface I built with my friend, we build the interface using React and Scss.

d6.description: This is a Portfolio Website I built with React.js and and styled using Scss.
